text: Aap farmaiye kay Allah Taalaa kay peda kiye huye asbaab-e-zeenat ko jin ko uss ney apney bandon kay wastay banaya hai aur khaney peenay ki halal cheezon ko kiss shaks ney haram kiya hai? Aap keh dijiye kay yeh ashiya iss tor per kay qayamat kay roz khalis hongi ehal-e-eman kay liye dunyawi zindagi mein mominon kay liye bhi hain. Hum issi tarah tamam aayaat ko samajh daron kay wastay saaf saaf biyan kertay hain
